## Introduction

```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
seqif_quants <- fread("./review/all_cell_types_per_region_final.csv")
seqif_quants_filtered <- seqif_quants %>%
  subset(region_name != "All")

immune_cells <- seqif_quants_filtered %>%
  subset(final_cell_type %in% c("Macrophages Trem2+","Macrophages Trem2-","Mono / Macros Ccr2+","Neutrophils","Other Leukocytes","Smooth muscle cells"))

non_immune <- seqif_quants_filtered %>%
  subset(!final_cell_type %in% immune_cells$final_cell_type)
```

```{r}
ggplot(immune_cells,aes(timepoint,mean_count)) +
  geom_bar(aes(fill = final_cell_type),color = "black", stat = "summary", fun = "mean", position = position_dodge(width = 0.9)) +
  geom_point(position = position_dodge(width = 0.9),pch =21,
             aes(fill = final_cell_type),color = "black",
             size = 2) +
  facet_grid(final_cell_type ~ region_name,
             scales = "free_y")
```
